title: What Is Polymyalgia Rheumatica? Have All Your Questions Answered.
description: If you, or a family member, have received a diagnosis of polymyalgia rheumatic, you can find yourself facing a lot of uncertainty. Even though it is a disorder that heals in time, you will be confronted with months of pain, exhaustion, powerful drugs, serious side effects and concerns about your health and wellbeing.You are likely to have many questions but not sure where you can get satisfactory answers. You may be struggling to get through the day, and not sure where to get support. This book is designed to meet the needs of anyone who has been diagnosed with polymyalgia rheumatica and/or giant cell arteritis and is desperate to find out more information about their diagnosis. If you have polymyalgia, and are looking for answers that can help to give you some certainty and control over your circumstances, this book is designed for you. This includes medical, treatment, psychological, diet, getting help, and where to get more information.
author: Mary Anne March
